summary: A NeMo multimodal subpackage that establishes a unified interface for Neural Radiance Field (NeRF) models, supplies foundational utilities for text‑guided rendering and mesh generation, and implements a complete DreamFusion training pipeline using PyTorch Lightning for text‑to‑3D synthesis.
business_intent: Enable rapid development of AI‑powered 3D content creation tools, allowing companies and researchers to generate high‑quality 3D assets from textual prompts for applications in AR/VR, gaming, visual effects, and digital commerce.
